enum: ABT2 status: National target reflecting ABT2  exists and progress is there, but at as insufficient rate

Countries that established national targets in accordance with Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011-2020 in their National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plans (1 = YES; 0 = NO) [15.9.1]
Countries with integrated biodiversity values into national accounting and reporting systems, defined as implementation of the System of Environmental-Economic Accounting  (1 = YES; 0 = NO) [15.9.1]
